verses.verse: Ask <WH7592> <WH8798> ye of the YY <WH3068> rain <WH4306> in the time <WH6256> of the latter rain <WH4456>; so the YY <WH3068> shall make <WH6213> <WH8802> bright clouds <WH2385>, and give <WH5414> <WH8799> them showers <WH1653> of rain <WH4306>, to every one <WH376> grass <WH6212> in the field <WH7704>.

For the idols <WH8655> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> vanity <WH205>, and the diviners <WH7080> <WH8802> have seen <WH2372> <WH8804> a lie <WH8267>, and have told <WH1696> <WH8762> false <WH7723> dreams <WH2472>; they comfort <WH5162> <WH8762> in vain <WH1892>: therefore they went <WH5265> <WH8804> their way as a flock <WH6629>, they were troubled <WH6031> <WH8799>, because there was no shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802>.

Mine anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8804> against the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802>, and I punished <WH6485> <WH8799> the goats <WH6260>: for the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath visited <WH6485> <WH8804> his flock <WH5739> the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and hath made <WH7760> <WH8804> them as his goodly <WH1935> horse <WH5483> in the battle <WH4421>.
Out of him came forth <WH3318> <WH8799> the corner <WH6438>, out of him the nail <WH3489>, out of him the battle <WH4421> bow <WH7198>, out of him every oppressor <WH5065> <WH8802> together <WH3162>.

And they shall be as mighty <WH1368> men, which tread down <WH947> <WH8802> their enemies in the mire <WH2916> of the streets <WH2351> in the battle <WH4421>: and they shall fight <WH3898> <WH8738>, because the YY <WH3068> is with them, and the riders <WH7392> <WH8802> on horses <WH5483> shall be confounded <WH3001> <WH8689>.

And I will strengthen <WH1396> <WH8765> the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and I will save <WH3467> <WH8686> the house <WH1004> of Yosef <WH3130>, and I will bring them again to place <WH3427> <WH8689> them; for I have mercy <WH7355> <WH8765> upon them: and they shall be as though <WH834> I had not cast them off <WH2186> <WH8804>: for I am the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430>, and will hear <WH6030> <WH8799> them.

And they of Efrayim <WH669> shall be like a mighty <WH1368> man, and their heart <WH3820> shall rejoice <WH8055> <WH8804> as through wine <WH3196>: yea, their children <WH1121> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> it, and be glad <WH8055> <WH8804>; their heart <WH3820> shall rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799> in the YY <WH3068>.

I will hiss <WH8319> <WH8799> for them, and gather <WH6908> <WH8762> them; for I have redeemed <WH6299> <WH8804> them: and they shall increase <WH7235> <WH8804> as they have increased <WH7235> <WH8804>.

And I will sow <WH2232> <WH8799> them among the people <WH5971>: and they shall remember <WH2142> <WH8799> me in far countries <WH4801>; and they shall live <WH2421> <WH8804> with their children <WH1121>, and turn again <WH7725> <WH8804>.

I will bring them again <WH7725> <WH8689> also out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and gather <WH6908> <WH8762> them out of Ashur <WH804>; and I will bring <WH935> <WH8686> them into the land <WH776> of Gil`ad <WH1568> and Lebanon <WH3844>; and place shall not be found <WH4672> <WH8735> for them.

And he shall pass through <WH5674> <WH8804> the sea <WH3220> with affliction <WH6869>, and shall smite <WH5221> <WH8689> the waves <WH1530> in the sea <WH3220>, and all the deeps <WH4688> of the river <WH2975> shall dry up <WH3001> <WH8689>: and the pride <WH1347> of Ashur <WH804> shall be brought down <WH3381> <WH8717>, and the sceptre <WH7626> of Egypt <WH4714> shall depart away <WH5493> <WH8799>.
And I will strengthen <WH1396> <WH8765> them in the YY <WH3068>; and they shall walk up and down <WH1980> <WH8691> in his name <WH8034>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.
